critique: The document is an executive order focused on environmental justice, aiming to address disproportionately high and adverse health or environmental effects on minority and low-income populations. It establishes an interagency working group and requires federal agencies to develop strategies for environmental justice. The order emphasizes research, data collection, public participation, and ensuring that federal programs do not discriminate based on race, color, or national origin. It also addresses subsistence consumption of fish and wildlife and Native American programs.
